description: The Interview - Director Michael Soldier interviews TonyScalia for a role in the next shoot. Of course our director must 'tryout' the new model on the casting couch - and what a new model heis! Tony, with his colt-like body, is a study in man-beef, and he putsevery lean pound to work as he sends Soldier over the edge ofecstasy. Obviously, Scalia gets the job!s
title: The Dirty Director, Scene #01
